testcase.name: user can place order by registering while checkout
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to baseUrl...................................................passed And verify that home page is visible successfully...........................passed When add products to cart...................................................passed When click Cart button......................................................passed Then verify that cart page is displayed.....................................passed When click Proceed To Checkout..............................................passed And click Register Login button.............................................passed And fill all details in Signup and create account...........................passed Then verify ACCOUNT CREATED! and click Continue button......................passed Then verify that Logged in as username is visible...........................passed When click Cart button......................................................passed And click Proceed To Checkout button........................................passed Then verify Address Details and Review Your Order...........................passed And enter description in comment text area and click Place Order............passed And enter payment details: Name on Card, Card Number, CVC, Expiration date..passed When click Pay and Confirm Order button.....................................passed Then verify success message Your order has been placed successfully!........passed Then verify Delete Account button is visible................................passed
